titleStmt.title: Amphitryon, or, The two Socia's a comedy : as it is acted at the Theatre Royal / written by Mr. Dryden ; to which is added the musick of the songs, compos'd by Mr. Henry Purcel.
titleStmt.author: Dryden, John, 1631-1700.
Plautus, Titus Maccius. Amphitruo.
Molière, 1622-1673. Amphitryon.
Purcell, Henry, 1659-1695. Amphitryon.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Tonson ... and M. Tonson ...,

notesStmt.note: The songs (13 p. at end) have special t.p. with title: The songs in Amphitryon, with the musick composed by Mr. Henry Purcell. London : Printed by J. Heptinstall for Jacob Tonson, 1690.
Published later with subtitle: The two Sosia's.
First ed., first issue. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Worcester College Library, Oxford and British Library.
